actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A joint resolution requiring the Secretary of Agriculture to continue the emergency disaster relief program under section 328 of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

summary.text: Reasserts the Congressional intent and directs the Secretary of Agriculture to continue to provide emergency assistance to qualified applicants, who suffer loss, damage, or injury as the result of a disaster which occurs on or before June 30, 1973, under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

titles.title: A joint resolution requiring the Secretary of Agriculture to continue the emergency disaster relief program under section 328 of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.
